chart.title: System Load
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" | timechart span=1m avg(sysLoad) by host

chart.title: File Descriptors
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" |timechart max(openFD) as "Open File Descriptors" ,max(maxFD) as "Max File Descriptors" by host

chart.title: Physical Memory
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" |eval memoryUsed=(physMem-freePhysMem) | timechart span=5m max(physMem) as "Total Memory" ,max(memoryUsed) as "Used Memory" by host
